alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 3:50PM EST until January 29 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 PM EST Sunday the stage was 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 8.2 feet early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Sun 3 pm: 11.0 Forecast: Sun 7 pm 11.0 Mon 1 am 11.0 Mon 7 am 9.9 Mon 1 pm 9.2 Mon 7 pm 9.5 Tue 1 am 9.4 Tue 7 am 9.2 Tue 1 pm 9.0 Tue 7 pm 8.8 Wed 1 am 8.6 Wed 7 am 8.4 &&
